pyAH documentationÂ¶

These are the documentation pages of pyAH project, and Atlantis Helper developed in Python and wxPython.

Project has been developed to provide general tools to work with Atlantis. So atlantis.parsers sub-package implements generic parsing tools that can be used by other projects others Atlantis PBEM players can develop, not only for pyAH.

Packages in pyAH project:

  • atlantis.parsers
    • atlantis.parsers.reportparser
    • atlantis.parsers.ordersparser
  • atlantis.helpers.json
    • json_dump_list()
    • json_load_list()
    • JsonSerializable
  • atlantis.gamedata
    • atlantis.gamedata.gamedata
    • atlantis.gamedata.region
    • atlantis.gamedata.rules
  • atlantis.wxgui
    • atlantis.wxgui.hexmap
